tools.name: list_folders
tools.description:
Lists all available Outlook mail folders.

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of folder names.

    Example:
        list_folders()

tools.name: list_recent_emails
tools.description:
Retrieves a list of email subject lines from a specified folder within a given number of days.

    Args:
        days: Number of days to look back for recent emails (must be non-negative).
        folder: Name of the folder to search in (optional; defaults to the inbox).

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of email subject lines.

    Example:
        list_recent_emails(days=7, folder="Inbox")

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description:
Searches for emails based on keywords or contact names within a specified time range and folder.

    Args:
        keyword: Keyword to search for in the email body or subject.
        contact: Contact name or email address to filter results.
        start_date: Start date for the search range (format: `YYYY-MM-DD`).
        end_date: End date for the search range (format: `YYYY-MM-DD`).
        folder: Name of the folder to search in (optional; defaults to the inbox).

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of matching email subject lines.

    Example:
        search_emails(keyword="urgent", contact="john.doe@example.com", start_date="2023-01-01", end_date="2023-01-31", folder="Inbox")

tools.name: get_email_by_number
tools.description:
Retrieves detailed information (body and attachments) for a specific email from the last listed set of emails.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last listed set of emails.

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing the email's body, subject, and attachment details.

    Example:
        get_email_by_number(email_number=5)

tools.name: reply_to_email_by_number
tools.description:
Sends a reply to a specific email from the last listed set of emails.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last listed set of emails.
        reply_content: Content of the reply message.

    Returns:
        A string indicating success or failure of the operation.

    Example:
        reply_to_email_by_number(email_number=5, reply_content="Thank you for your email. I will review it shortly.")

tools.name: compose_email
tools.description:
Creates and sends a new email with specified recipients, subject, body, and optional attachments.

    Args:
        to: Comma-separated list of recipient email addresses.
        cc: Comma-separated list of CC recipient email addresses (optional).
        subject: Subject of the email.
        body: Body content of the email.
        attachments: List of file paths to attach (optional).

    Returns:
        A string indicating success or failure of the operation.

    Example:
        compose_email(
            to="recipient@example.com",
            cc="cc_recipient@example.com",
            subject="Meeting Reminder",
            body="Please remember to attend the meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.",
            attachments=["path/to/file1.pdf", "path/to/file2.docx"]
        )

response.result: {"error": "Date format error: time data '2023/01/01' does not match format '%Y-%m-%d'"}

search_emails.purpose: 验证当指定的文件夹不存在时，工具是否能优雅地处理并返回错误信息。

get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证 get_email_by_number 工具能够根据指定的邮件索引成功获取邮件正文、主题和附件信息。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Attempt To Retrieve Email With Invalid Index
get_email_by_number.purpose: 测试当提供的 email_number 参数为负数时，工具是否能正确返回参数错误信息。
验证当提供的 email_number 超出已列出邮件范围时，工具是否能优雅处理并返回错误。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Security Check For Sensitive Data Exposure
get_email_by_number.purpose: 确保 get_email_by_number 工具在响应中不会暴露敏感数据（如用户凭据、内部路径等）。
验证 get_email_by_number 工具能否正确获取列表中的第一封邮件内容。
验证 get_email_by_number 工具能否正确获取列表中的最后一封邮件内容。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Special Characters In Content
get_email_by_number.purpose: 测试 get_email_by_number 是否能正确处理包含特殊字符的邮件内容。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email When No Emails Are Listed
get_email_by_number.purpose: 模拟没有邮件被列出的情况，验证 get_email_by_number 是否能正确返回错误信息。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Valid Email By Number
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证 reply_to_email_by_number 工具能够成功向指定索引的邮件发送回复。

args.reply_content: This is a test reply to the selected email.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To First Email In List
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 测试工具是否能正确处理索引为0的邮件（边界情况）。

args.reply_content: This is a reply to the first email in the list.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Last Email In List
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 测试工具是否能正确处理索引为最大值的邮件（边界情况）。

args.reply_content: This is a reply to the last email in the list.

reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 reply_content 参数为空时，工具是否能返回错误信息。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Attempt Reply With Negative Email Number
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 测试当 email_number 参数为负数时，工具是否能正确处理参数错误。

args.reply_content: This should not be sent due to invalid index.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Attempt Reply To Nonexistent Email Index
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 测试当 email_number 超出已列出邮件范围时，工具是否能优雅地失败。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply With Special Characters In Content
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证工具是否能正确处理包含特殊字符的回复内容。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Security Check For Sensitive Data Exposure
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 确保 reply_to_email_by_number 在响应中不会暴露敏感数据（如用户凭据、内部路径等）。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Required To Field Only
compose_email.purpose: 验证仅使用必填参数 'to' 发送邮件的基本功能是否正常工作。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With To And Subject
compose_email.purpose: 验证包含收件人和主题的邮件是否能正确创建并发送。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With To, Subject And Body
compose_email.purpose: 验证包含收件人、主题和正文内容的邮件是否能成功发送。

args.subject: Project Update
args.body: Please find the latest project updates attached.

compose_email.purpose: 验证CC字段是否能被正确处理并包含在邮件中。

args.subject: Copy Included
args.body: This email includes a CC recipient.

compose_email.purpose: 验证包含一个附件的邮件能否正确发送。
验证包含多个附件的邮件能否正确发送。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Empty To Field
compose_email.purpose: 验证当收件人地址为空时，工具是否能正确返回错误信息。

args.subject: Empty To Field Test
args.body: This should fail due to empty 'to' field.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Invalid Email Format
compose_email.purpose: 验证当提供格式不正确的邮箱地址时，工具是否能正确处理错误。

args.subject: Invalid Email Address
args.body: This should fail due to invalid email format.

compose_email.purpose: 验证当提供的附件文件不存在时，工具是否能优雅地处理错误。

args.subject: Nonexistent File Attachment
args.body: Trying to attach a non-existent file.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Special Characters In Subject
compose_email.purpose: 验证包含特殊字符的主题是否能被正确处理。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Long Recipient List
compose_email.purpose: 验证当收件人列表非常长时，工具是否仍能正常工作。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email Without Connecting To Mail Server
compose_email.purpose: 模拟邮件服务器不可用情况，验证工具是否能正确处理异常并返回有意义的错误信息。

args.subject: Server Unavailable
args.body: Testing without actual mail server connection.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Sensitive Data In Body
compose_email.purpose: 确保compose_email不会在响应中暴露敏感数据（如密码、API密钥等）。

args.subject: Sensitive Information Test
args.body:
Username: testuser
Password: secretpassword123
API Key: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
